DOC.brief_title: Dose Escalation Of Icotinib In Previously Treated Patients With Routine Dose
DOC.detailed_description: Lung cancer major cause morbidity mortality , rapidest increase type cancer China 5 time incidence rate increase past 30 year . Tyrosine kinase inhibitor ( TKIs ) epidermal growth factor receptor ( EGFR ) widely use treatment patient non-small cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) . Icotinib novel EGFR-TKI develop group Chinese scientist clinician . Icotinib appear non-inferior Gefitinib term efficacy , good term safety , large therapeutic window phase I-III trial . In study , open , single-center , single arm phase IV trial design evaluate safety efficacy dose escalation icotinib treatment advance NSCLC patient failure routine dose . PFS ( progress free survival ) primary end-point OS ( overall survival ) , ORR ( objective response ) , TTP ( time progress ) , HRQOL safety secondary end-point .
